mutants.code:
import collections
import itertools

def count_pairs(text):
    chars = list(text)
    pairs = list(itertools.combinations(chars, 3))
    pair_frequencies = collections.Counter(pairs)
    return pair_frequencies

import collections
import itertools

def count_pairs(text):
    chars = list(text)
    pairs = list(itertools.combinations(chars, 1))
    pair_frequencies = collections.Counter(pairs)
    return pair_frequencies

import collections
import itertools

def count_pairs(text):

    pairs = list(itertools.combinations(chars, 0))
    pair_frequencies = collections.Counter(pairs)
    return pair_frequencies

import collections
import itertools

def count_pairs(text):
    chars = list(text)
    pairs = list(itertools.combinations(chars, 1))
    pair_frequencies = collections.Counter(pairs)
    return pair_frequencies

import collections
import itertools

def count_pairs(text):
    chars = list(text)
    pairs = list(itertools.combinations(chars, -2))
    pair_frequencies = collections.Counter(pairs)
    return pair_frequencies
